Significant factual errors and contradictions warrant score of 2.
reasoning.completeness: Gold covers 6 key conditions with specific inquiries/citations: (1) Trauma [D-5], (2) Cardiac (multiple), (3) Infectious [D-12,D-27], (4) Asthma [D-23,D-24], (5) Dyspnea [D-19], (6) Inherited arrhythmia [D-31,D-32]. Generated covers ~10-20% via partial cardiac overlap; misses 5 entirely, adds irrelevant anxiety. Score: 1 (<20%).
reasoning.faithfulness: Partial grounding: family history [D-30-32], palpitations/anxiety link [D-20,P-20]; but hallucinates 'doctor screened for cardiac risk factors, likely inquiring about family history' (doctor did ask but more specifically sudden death/arrhythmias); misinterprets P-20 as 'excluding chest pain as independent' when it links symptoms to anxiety; infers unasked 'anxiety screening' via triggers; claims 'ruling out' anxiety opposite of transcript intent. Multiple hallucinations: score 2.
reasoning.relevance: Structure mimics Gold (lists conditions with inquiries/responses) and addresses screening/ruling out, but focuses on wrong/incomplete conditions (anxiety not ruled out, misses most Gold points), making it partially relevant with off-topic content: score 3.

summary: The Generated Answer is largely incorrect and incomplete, covering only a minor portion of the Gold Answer's ruled-out conditions while hallucinating anxiety as ruled out and misrepresenting cardiac screening.
